Shangri-La (mythical location)/Shangri-La town and county in Dêqên or Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Yunnan/formerly Gyeltang or Gyalthang, Chinese 中甸[Zhong1 dian4] in Tibetan province of Kham

sentences.english: The conjurer waved his magic wand and pulled a rabbit out of the hat.
sentences.chinese: 魔術師揮舞魔杖，從帽子里拉出一隻兔子。

sentences.english: You can even drag them from the Call Pet flyout.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以從召喚寵物圖標里拉它們出來。

sentences.english: The party secretary says he wants to turn the "city village" of Huaxi into a Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 他表示自己想把華西村建設成香格里拉。

sentences.english: Frank jerked a dirty blue handkerchief from his trousers pocket .
sentences.chinese: 富蘭克慌亂地從褲兜里拉出一條骯髒的藍手帕。

sentences.english: Tiger Leaping Gorge, we were caught in a traffic due to debris flow.
sentences.chinese: 從香格里拉到虎跳峽的路上，因泥石流出現堵車。

sentences.english: Benny pulled the car out of the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 班尼把車從溝里拉了出來。

sentences.english: Do you want to know more about shangrila ?
sentences.chinese: 想了解更多的香格里拉嗎？

sentences.english: We went back to visit Lijiang and Shangrila.
sentences.chinese: 我們重遊了麗江和香格里拉。

sentences.english: The boat ride starts at the Fish & Flower harbor and ends up by the Shangri-la Hotel or reverse.
sentences.chinese: 遊船從花港觀魚開始到香格里拉酒店結束或是返回。

sentences.english: The word lira is the Arabic translation of pound.
sentences.chinese: 里拉是阿拉伯語中磅的翻譯。

sentences.english: Everyone has a SHANGRI-LA in heart. But SHANGRI-LA is unique, where is my SHANGRI-LA?
sentences.chinese: 每個人心中都有一個香格里拉，我的在哪裏呢？

sentences.english: Songtsam also has two comfortable hotels in the area now known as Shangri-la.
sentences.chinese: 松贊在香格里拉也擁有兩家舒適的酒店。

sentences.english: Varela had his good side, but my freedom doesn't have a price, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 萬里拉有他好的一面，但是我的自由是無價的。

sentences.english: Located on a mews lane in Rathmines it is sufficiently large to support a family over a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 位於馬廄里拉思曼斯它大到足以支持一個家庭的一生。

sentences.english: If we lose the human side of our world, in the end, we still have to find Shangrila and bring.
sentences.chinese: 如果失去了自我的世界，最終，我們將再尋香格里拉。
